Reviews.Title: “LAZY SUMMER”
Reviews.Author: silver010
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Orange Blossom,July 6,7,2012 Booked here because my husband is a smoker, and it is hard to find a good ,clean motel,outside of a truck stop these days that allows smoking. The room was clean,off the busy road 76 where traffic is so heavy,breakfast is pretty sparse but overall nice clean,very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: JnR2
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 days. We were able to get the room for a "3 night special" of $99, which made this a very good value. The room was a dbl queen, with typical furnishings, beds were not plush, but comfortable, very clean and well maintained. The AC was a little loud, but it worked well during a hot season. The outdoor pool and hot tub were nice. The staff was friendly, and overall the property was well maintained and clean. Our room was on the second floor (only two floors) w/o an elevator. It is conveniently located towards the west end of the strip, with easy access, near restaurants, show theaters, shopping, and other attractions. Breakfast was limited to donuts, waffles, and cereal. We gave this an "average" rating because of the many motels we've stayed in at Branson, there wasn't really anything to set this one apart from the other good ones. It's pretty "no frills" basic. We would stay here again. (Note: We've had friends stay here in the past, and we did NOT see any signs of some of the negative reviews mentioned of this motel.

Reviews.Title: “We hated it !”
Reviews.Author: Yankeetruckers
Reviews.Content: We purchased a Branson vacation package from Terina Marketing and this was the hotel they put us in. We hated it so bad we went home and learned an expensive lesson about vacation packages since we couldn't get our money back. Upon first opening the door to the room it smelled horrible of cigarrette smoke (mind you I'm a heavy smoker and one of the weird people that like the smell of smoke) but this smell was overwhelming even for me. The next thing we notice is all of the holes burnt into the filfthy carpet, then the sign on the toilet advising you to continue to hold the handle down through the whole flushing cycle. Really?? Fix the toilet people, it's not that difficult. Then I noticed a dirty throw rug on the floor by the door, I lifted it up and it was covering a big rip in the carpet, OK, I can see that, but there was actually a clean spot on the carpet where the throw rug was, the carpet was so filfthy that you could see the outline of the throw rug. The TV screen was about the size of my laptop screen, yellow dripping on the walls from the years of smoke, and a wonderful view of the parking lot. Stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Orange Blossom Inn is special!”
Reviews.Author: carlandreponot
Reviews.Content: The rooms are plain and simple, but immaculate! How many times do you stay at a 4 or 5 star facility and wonder how it got that rating? The staff of Orange Blossom Inn is caring and work very hard to keep the property extremely clean. They are very pleasant to associate with and the location is perfect to avoid traffic issues. Thanks to all who work there for a beautiful 3 day stay!

Reviews.Title: “We'll return in Sept.”
Reviews.Author: caumminghammie
Reviews.Content: The service was incrediable, very friendly n nice people. The rooms were nice, clean, and the area was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful inn, great staff, clean, great location and will return back next year.”
Reviews.Author: KvSxEvCv
Reviews.Content: Love the staff there. They welcome u with a smile. Very clean rooms, and great service. Love where the Inn is located. My family and I stay there for 3 days and my childern enjoyed their breakfast there every morning(they love thier pancakes). Every year we come visted Branson,MO Orange Blossom is always a wonderful place we enjoyed staying.

Reviews.Title: “Very dark and bathroom unsafe”
Reviews.Author: sedonared7
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was extremely dark even with all four lights on and the drapes open. We had a jacuzzi room and the tub was very unsafe to get in and out. There was only hand bar on the outside half way up by the shower head. Tub was slippery and I needed my husband to help me. Most hotels/motels supply small bottles of shampoo, conditioner and lotion. Not here, bring your own. Also there were no small bars of soap. The sink and tub area had "public restroom" soap dispensers. Very tacky. We will look elsewhere next time in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “stay somewhere else”
Reviews.Author: charlieray2727
Reviews.Content: Worst place i have ever styed in over 40 yrs of travel. Dirty and stained carpets, smelled of old cigarette smoke but it says it was smoke free room. NOT a drop of hot water and the manager/owner didn't give a damn about making it right. If it hadn't been so late when I arrived I would have gone elsewhere. rented this room via priceline bidding and this is my first poor experience with Priceline

HotelInfo.Name: Orange Blossom Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 3355 Shepherd Of The Hills Expy, Branson, MO 65616
